remarks: ~ itg2gt0 holds on functions continuous on an open interval in the absence of ~ ax-cc .  The fourth hypothesis is made unnecessary by the continuity hypothesis.  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 16-Nov-2017.)

itg2gt0cn.cn $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` ( X (,) Y ) ) e. ( ( X (,) Y ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
itg2gt0cn $p |- ( ph -> 0 < ( S.2 ` F ) ) $.
